title: OPIc Practice Test 1 - Intermediate Low
description: Complete OPIc simulation targeting Intermediate Low proficiency

questions: Please state your name and spell it for me.
Tell me what you do for work or study.
Describe the place where you live.

scenarios.setup: You're in a job interview and discussing salary and benefits. The interviewer represents the company.
scenarios.rolePlay: The salary offer is lower than expected, and the benefits package doesn't include some things you need. Negotiate professionally.
scenarios.followUp: The company can't increase the salary, but they're open to other benefits. What would you propose?
